name: Kasm Technologies
description: The official store for Kasm supported workspaces.

workspaces.description: Chromium is a free and open-source browser, primarily developed and maintained by Google.
workspaces.name: kasmweb/chromium:develop

workspaces.description: Debian is a Linux distribution composed of free and open-source software, developed by the community-supported Debian Project
workspaces.name: yjcm/debian-kasm:latest
workspaces.notes:
The Kasm Debian Bookworm Workspace requires libseccomp => 2.5.3 to run.

This can be checked by running runc --version

If you still want to run Debian Bookworm but do not have the minimum required libseccomp version, it can be run in an unsecure manner by adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) setting above.

NOTE: This will run the Workspace without the docker seccomp sandbox and will significantly reduce the amount of protection that Kasm Workspaces can provide.
